pages.text: A simple musket ball, but well constructed. For aspiring gunslingers, this is a good start. It has enough damage potential to seriously wreck enemies with some strategy.$(br2)And, its not hard to find copper so you can get a good stock ready.
$(o)Deals $(l)2.40$()$(o) base damage. See $(l:ammunition/bullet_velocities_info)Guide: Bullet Damage$()$(o) for more information.
